Release Process#

  1. Update the versions in package.json, pdpexplorer/_version.py, pdpexplorer/_frontend.py, and docs/source/conf.py.

  2. Update documentation and run make html.

  3. Make a release commmit: git commit -m "release vX.Y.Z"

  4. Tag the commit: git tag vX.Y.Z

  5. Push the commit and tag: git push && git push --tags

  6. Release the npm packages: npm login and npm publish

  7. Bundle the Python package: python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel

  8. Install twine: pip install twine

  9. Publish the package to PyPI: twine upload dist/pdpexplorer-X.Y.Z*
